chat_history.message:
Hello,

The package of the order 41178979 could be not delivered because your customer refused the parcel.

What should the carrier do with this parcel?

Thank you.


Valérie DECAMPS

Dear ecomobile,

The carrier must send it back to you, on receipt of the parcel please refund the order

Kind regards,

Gacebe-Yann-Emmanuel from Back Market

Dear Backcare, 

We are currently awaiting the arrival of the parcel. In the meantime, please do NOT refund the parcel. 

Thank you.

Regards, 
YL

Dear Bakcare,

The carrier informs us that the customer asked a delivery in a pick up point. Can you check it out please?

Could you kindly ask what he wants to do?

Regards,
KW

Le client souhaite une livraison au point relai.

Merci de confirmer cela.

Bien cordialement,
Miora, Service client Back Market.

Dear Backcare,

The parcel has been delivered to the pickup point. KIndly confirm if the customer has received it. Thank you.

Regards,
AS
